text: [Music]
hello this is chef John for food wishes
calm with a simple really simple beef
pot roast just roasted with some
aromatic vegetables celery carrots
onions it makes its own sauce you do
nothing you do nothing you put in the
pot and you just you know go figure out
something to do for two and a half hours
so we're a brown a it's about three and
a half pounds a beef chuck roast beef
pot roast
nice big thick piece Brown it on both
sides over high heat and some vegetable
oil generously salt and pepper this
that's a big hunk of meat and also the
salt pepper is gonna flavor our veggies
and our juices all right so we're gonna
flip that over all right so once that
seared very well on both sides you're
gonna take it out of the pot and by the
way I'm filming this at sunset
so the light's gonna keep changing and
so you know you'll just have to put up
with it I'm gonna throw in a cup of
onions a cup of celery and a cup of
carrots just diced all right we're just
gonna saute those in the beef drippings
and that little bit of oil I'm gonna add
a half a stick of butter and I'm just
gonna cook that for about three minutes
then I'm gonna add a little bit of dried
rosemary about a teaspoon of dried
rosemary
I lost the footage so I have to draw it
so that's me right once I put in the
rosemary and stirred it around
I took the beef that I brown if you can
see that says beef I want to put that
back in the pot I'm gonna cover it and
I'm gonna put it in the oven
you're gonna put it in a very slow oven
275 for about two and a half three hours
it depends now you got to test it don't
go by my time your meat might be you
know bigger than my meat your oven might
be hotter so till it's fork-tender what
does that mean that's what it means fork
tender
all right the vegetables you want to
taste they should be beautifully
seasoned from the you know salt and
pepper from the beef I put that on some
horseradish mashed potatoes just to give
it a little kick and that's it the
juices from the beef the butter and the
natural juices from the vegetables make
this great topping for the beef so you
don't always need to have these
complicated sauce recipes and brews and
stocks and reductions and all that stuff
sometimes it's just nice to have plain
hot roasted beef with some just nice
soft what some people will call
overcooked but I call cooked vegetables
so beautiful so so nice I hope you give
that a try it could not be easier the
recipes on the site so go there to get
the ingredients and as always enjoy
you
